Package FOHClasses

Class Cover

java.lang.Object
FOHClasses.Cover
public class Cover extends Object
A class storing information of a cover, primarily which orders belong to it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cover

      public Cover(int coverId, long startTimestamp, int tableId)
      Constructs a new cover object
      Parameters:
      coverId - The ID of the cover object to create
      startTimestamp - The booking/cover's start time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      tableId - The table number that this cover is sat at

  • Method Details

    • addOrder

      public boolean addOrder(int orderId)
      Adds a new order to the cover.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to add
      Returns:
      Whether an order was successfully added. Fails if order already added

    • removeOrder

      public boolean removeOrder(int orderId)
      Removes an order from the cover.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to remove
      Returns:
      Whether the order existed and was part of the cover
